readable.title: 2760716468_b541e9fd0f
readable.content: A man sits on a step with two duffel bags and a plastic bag by his sides . A man wearing sandals sits on the sidewalk near some bags . Bald , older man sits in gray stone area with bags , clapping hands . Man with duffel bag sitting on a concrete curb . Man with grey beard sitting on the sidewalk with bags on either side of him .
